page.title: 11Meon Valley Country Club.
page.content: The Meon Valley Golf and Country Club,just outside Wickham, Hampshire, is set in 145 acres. It has a pond, a swimming pool, sauna, and spa bath, two snooker tables, six squash courts, two tennis courts, a table tennis table and two golf courses (one practice course). It also has an hotel with 55 bedrooms, each with shower, bath and colour television. Other facilities are the Charter Room, Bar, Cafe, Restaurant and Conference Room. People can even have their wedding receptions there. Commander Phillimore founded the club in 1976, and it has 3,000 members. Members may invite guests at a cost of Â£1.00 a day. It costs half a million pounds a year to run, and makes a profit of three quarters of a million pounds. It provides an excellent leisure centre for the area.
